record.title: PRIVILEGE OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGE OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - June 18, 2008)

[Page: S5769]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Amanda Bowman and Jasmine Narcisse of my staff be granted the privilege of the floor for the duration of today's session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
